subject: Sales
title: Creating Leverage from Nothing
description: A 60-second lesson on Creating Leverage from Nothing.

hook.text: A tiny startup with no revenue lands a deal with a major retailer. They made themselves scarce.

buildup.text: Leverage isn't just resources. It's perception. If the other side believes you have options, you do.

discovery.text: Scarcity drives value. Limiting availability lets even a newcomer create urgency and demand.

twist.text: The key is framing, not lying. Don't fake options. Emphasize the unique value only you offer.

climax.text: Leverage comes from being hard to replace. If your offer is truly unique, size doesn't matter.

punchline.text: You don't need power. You need to be irreplaceable.

quiz.question: How can a small company create negotiation leverage?
